title: Introduction à la conception de système mécatronique
text:
Conception et Innovation
         
         
             “Think with your hands, build something or ty something, then talk about it, NOT the Reverse.” David Kelly, Founder IDEO & Standford Deisgn School
         
         
         
            Cours Magistraux            
            Guide de Travaux Dirigés

title: 1  Bienvenue
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.

1 + 1

[1] 2






Knuth, Donald E. 1984. “Literate Programming.” Comput. J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.

title: 2  Summary
text:
In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.

1 + 1

[1] 2

title: Introduction à la conception de système mécatronique
text:
3 Contacting me
E-mail and Slack are the best ways to get in contact with me. I will try to respond to all course-related e-mails and Slack messages within 24 hours (really), but also remember that life can be busy and chaotic for everyone (including me!), so if I don’t respond right away, don’t worry!

title: Introduction à la conception de système mécatronique
text:
3 Contacterz us
E-mail and Slack are the best ways to get in contact with me. I will try to respond to all course-related e-mails and Slack messages within 24 hours (really), but also remember that life can be busy and chaotic for everyone (including me!), so if I don’t respond right away, don’t worry!

title: Introduction à la conception de système mécatronique
text:
3 Contactez nous
L’e-mail et Microsoft teams sont les meilleurs moyens de nous contacter. On essai de répondre à tous les courriels et messages liés au cours dans les XX heures (vraiment), mais rappelez-vous aussi que la vie peut être occupée et chaotique pour tout le monde (y compris nous !), alors si je ne réponds pas tout de suite, ne vous inquiétez pas !
